posts.post_content:
1886 stereoview by George H. Monroe. The back has "Jameston B.B. Game 1886" written in pencil.

The line across the back image is from the scanner. The line across the animated gif is also from the scanner. You can see in the photo of the front that there is no white line.

[STRIKE]Asking $250 obo shipped.[/STRIKE] SOLD
